About

I am an Information Technology graduate specializing in Software Development. I have experience building web apps using Laravel (PHP), Vue.js, HTML, and SCSS (using Bootstrap 4). I also have experience using version control systems, such as Git. I am a very ambitious and hard-working person and I love learning new things. I also have a passion for football and I recently applied my knowledge of SQL to analyze open-source Premier League data. Through this analysis, I gained insights into the historical performances of different clubs.

Photo-Share

Photo-Share is an image sharing platform that is built on Laravel, a PHP framework. It allows users to edit and share pictures and messages. User can simply register, log in and add posts with just a click. The initial app was built based on a freeCodeCamp.org tutorial.

Resume

My personal website (this site) created with Bootstrap and pug. It is a static web page, with responsive portfolio grid and modal windows for each portfolio item. It has information about me and the portfolio of project I have built.
